values:
I miss her more then anything on this earth
i was 6 when she died but it still hurts 



life.
its complicated but when isnt it
jan. 12 marks the date that i will get my heart procedure
and the closer it gets the more worried and scared i get.
but it needs to be done i want to be able to play soccer, 
run harder and longer and i hate the anxiety, i have attacks every now and then
most recently was at the beach, just a small one but embarressing
the time before that was worse. ehhh i cant wait for it all to be GONE! 

i have amazing friends, and i just might like someone, 
this time i want to do things right...

people i miss....alot







i feel really lucky to have people in my life
that care a lot about me.  to the point where
they feel the need to tell me what they think
im doing is stupid.  yeah, i dont always listen
and i do need to make my own mistakes
which i have.  but you still love me anyway,
dispite the fact that im diffucult, and immature, 
and that i am hyper 99% of the time.  thank you
for always sticking by me no matter how far away
i am.  and making it seem like i never left.
Thank you to the ones that im with now
i never thought i'd meet people like you
ever, i thought that in this city, thats so boring,
people like you didn't exist.  i guess i was wrong lol

so bad things happen but good friends stick by you no matter what.

so maybe i love my friends
and maybe i get too crazy
and maybe they drink rockstars too much
and maybe i act really stupid around them
and maybe i feel left out sometimes cus were completly different
and maybe they understand me more then most people
and maybe they're the only ones who havent screwed me over
and maybe i swear more now thanks to them
and maybe i'm better looking then them
and maybe i couldn't picture life without them
but just maybe they're all guys.....
bet you werent expecting that

yep
i love my close friends,  thankss for being there for me
no one else has ever made me feel worth it.

But I guess I actually have something worth talking about...

So many people are asking so if you still read this shit then 

So this all started with me going to get my sports physical to play soccer.
They did the whole listen to my heart thing and then said you have a heart murmmer and irregular heart beat
which I have had since middle school.  Wasn't supprised but they did an EKG and said they wouldn't sign it till I went to a cardiologist.

My parents had to make a lot of phone calls, seeing as i can't get in to any but a pediatric (sp?) one.
So the nearest one they found was in Tampa.

I went 2 Fridays ago.  I thought they would tell me if I could play soccer, but no.
They did another EKG and then some echo thing but you could see my heart and everything.
I feel bad for it, its pretty messed up lol 
I had a heart monitor for 24 hours, i looked retarded haha
Some people talk to me like its a serious thing and think thats its really weird that I can laugh about it.
Its really not that big of a deal.  It doesn't bother me.  
I go tomorrow to do a stress test and then they'll tell me if I can play soccer. 

So I worked at my job for maybe a month and some odd weeks and then 2 weeks ago I put in my two weeks,
I hate it, i hate the people, i don't think im a working girl.  Maybe I'll get a new job next year? lol

Ohh and I met a boy. =) hes pretty much the newest thing in my life right now besides my heart problems. 
Its only been a week so I'm not going to talk it up.

im done
im done wanting to hang out w/friends
and when they call me they're drunk
or high
im done trying to let friends know im moving
they dont seem to care anyway
im done trying to make people happy
im done 
im just done
and im done with LJ
its gay 

all people use it for is to tell everyone their drunken or high stories
well i dont have any

im sick of everything
i can NOT wait to leave this place

school in like 5 days
joy.

so since ive been bored for about a week now ive noticed something

I sound like my mom
I have boy-ish feet and girly hands
i'm pretty built for being a girl 
and its sick
I miss stella 
ALOT
my family is pretty crazy (in a funny way) 
i didn't realize how much they drink when they're all together lol
time is flying by wayy too fast
my cousin graduated..
now both my uncles have gray hair
i finally figured out who i look like in my family 
cus i don't look like my mom or my dad
oh and im really short..ive noticed that alot lately 
&& its for sale...
going back may be the best thing right now. 
even tho at times i didn't think so, but i miss it
and i guess im excited...

I do not want to go back home
I love cocoa beach
There are so many intersting people here
and so much to do! 

I surfed today
caught 8 or 9 rides
It was truly amazing
I havent had time to do that in soo long
I thought I wasn't going to remember how

My grandpa seems to be doing better,,
I feel like I can actually say 
He thinks I'm better then my brother at surfing
WOW that has to be a first!! =) lol

They still don't feel like grandparents to me
Its almost like they're someone else's 
Its kinda confusing 
but they could care less about how I feel
they only care about school and my friends

ANYWAY..
It feels good to be away from the Cape
1 week and 4 days left of school! Can't wait


<3

I have made alot of changes this week.

Its just a matter of time before things get better again.

We barely talk anymore, 
its as if you just don't see me as a friend.
And hanging out isn't one of ur plans.
What happend?

I'm mad that we can't get along 
your work gets in the way of everything.
You don't understand me anymore...
Maybe were drifting apart?

A few more things to do and then
the deal is final.
I can't wait to just have space....<3

I hate how people make a big deal about decisions I make.  
Why do they care so much? 
I am who I am, sorry if you don't like it.
Why do they try to make me second guess myself?  
Well, I won't.  
And I refuse to feel bad when I made the right choice...
PERIOD 


Maybe most of all I hate people who act like they care
When they don't
Or act like they "love me"
when they talk bad about me when Im not around
Maybe the reason I distance myself from people
or act stand off-ish is because I'm afraid to get hurt
or put myself out there

Theres a move in the future
I feel bad to say this, but I'm glad
I will say a few good things
I learned alot about myself
so much more then what I thought I knew.
And I met some amazing people...
who will never be forgotten

Theres this boy
hmmmm..
no one makes me feel, 
the way he makes me feel.
I know hes not the right guy for me
but I can't let go...
something keeps me hanging on.
sooo should I still tell him how I feel?

Soo..shit happens too bad it didn't 
things are ok,
but could be so much better
I try to have fun and make the best out of most things,
but I cant help but think I could have been more fun
or been more ohh...enthusastic? 
Sometimes I'm just not in the mood for anything
and I get really calm and just blah
kinda weird for me..
anyway, things change and so do people.
I suppose thats just a part of life.
Sorta the part of life I hate, but love at the same time.
Sometimes change is good & sometimes it sucks.
Somethings should just be left alone and unchanged..

bored. bored. bored.
plain strawberry poptarts suck
theres too many clouds
& im still tired..
=\ 

BUT!

theres no school..
yesss

its amazing how life is..i used to get soo upset about things
now i (mostaly ) dont care that much anymore
and its weird how it can just make one big circle
and you end up right where you started..

i love that i have a few friends that still really do care about me
even in michigan..
i feel like i could pick up the phone and call molly anytime 
no matter whats going on
same with my cousin (whos 17) whos practilly my twin
i know if i ever needed to talk to someone shed be there to listen
shes more of an older sister who doesnt live with me lol 
now shes getting ready to graduate 
and i couldnt be happier for her

i finally feel like im getting older..=) 
my 16th birthday is comeing up soon
no plans as of right now.. =( oh well
and i filled an application for a job today
i may not get it but just filling it out was so weird
i can still picture being 5 and sitting in the big red truck(my dads old blazer) 
and not being able to see over the dashboard and singing a hootie and the blow fish song
driving really fast down the hill on penninsula dr. with my dad...

funny how things change in almost a blink of an eye

things i miss

being able to talk to my dad like i used to 
muskegon of course
all my friends there
my grandma..
how i used to be so involved at church...
now sometimes i dred going
my family up north
the way my grandparents were when i was little
being little...
i think i miss being little the most
things were sooooo much easier..
maybe i wanted to grow up too soon
sdkjfhslidgfjsagd
=)

everyone should be smacked with twizzlers...

no more liers and backstabbers and 2-faced people and hypocrits...

deal?

soo these are the kool people..





angel...lol!! 

friends are kool..=)

so i dont update..lol i use my xanga more..
things are still pretty messed up
but its high school 
guys are lame...im takin a break from them
grades are GOOD thank god 
i got my report card last weekend..
all a's and b's! 

soccer is good...districts tomorrow..
not sure how good thats going to be
cus were plain mariner..=\

last weekend was fun 
hung out with some people i havent in a while
and some girls that rock my world
still nothing compairs to skee town
i was always going somewhere 
always had something better to do
had awesome guy friends that were not lame lol 
i miss the lake
the people who made me want to go to school everyday
the girls that never told my secrets
the girls that laughed at my blonde moments
the ones who had fun doing nothing on a friday night 
but just hang out together
the guys that made me ALMOST pee my pants
the guys who i thought were lame lol
the guys who i could have an actual convo with
the friends who liked mini golf, watching movies,
laughing about nothing, not caring what other people thought
cus we had eachother and we thought we were awesome

now its all gone...
untill every summer i go back...
untill then i live with
liers, backstabbers, 2 faced people, haters, posers
fakers, people who u thought u could trust, friends who u thought
would always be there, guys who u thought liked the person u were
but they only wanted to get in ur pants
it sux but its life..i guess i need to get used to it


<3333

i've been missing this for a while...I think that its just crazy how the one place u wished u could get out of and go somewhere else is the place u always want to go back to... 

things just seem to be messing up alot..

soccer, guys, friends, grades, everything..

heyy!wow i haven't updated in a long time..ive been using xanga insted but i guess i'll just update this real quick..umm i think it was last weekend john justin aimee and tyler came over.  We just hung out and had a fun time.  tyler really needs to get his own tv show..lmao!! good times..then last thurday I went to the freshman game only to find out that it was canceled so justin had this great idea to run around the track and then him and tyler threw me in a HUGE puddle..lol i was so mad and John got mad too lol it was funny.  Friday night i left to go to cocoa beach to see my grandparents who i havent seen since i dont know when...my grandpa hurt his back a while ago and now his neck is kinda screwed  up so he has to get sugery...im kinda scared for him, even tho at times i really dont like him at all but he might be in a wheel chair for the rest of his life or he could have strokes...so idk whats gunna happen..theres so many bad side affects.  Idk..i miss john tho..lol i have like no one to talk to everyone i used to hang out with here are all lame no execpt Lani..shes hawaiian..lol shes still the same and so is jason i guess but erick is all lame now and doesnt want to do anything like we used to oh well and joe and matt are in collage now =[ there goes our ride..now we walk everywhere lol but yeah im coming home tomorrow so i'll prolly get to do something on tuesday! =] i'll write more later...

kayla-

wow im pretty sure the whole time ive been at molly's ive gotten maybe 8 hrs. of sleep...lol! so many long nights...haha so yesterday was fun! I hung out with tony scott kyle mattson gleason scott chirs jake rachel molly mary KP britt and mary...(it was like out old group again, kinda kool!lol) i have to say that was the most fun ive had all summer.  I missed hanging out with all of them and i thought it was cool that we all got to hang out.  after everyone left i just walked to the fire pit by myself and sat on the chair..i was just tryin to figure out why the hell i moved in the first place when i have so much fun with everyone..we could be doing nothing and we still have fun. I miss staying up late with molly and all those girls..we could just talk about anything that was bothering us and know that no of us would say anything to anyone.  it so weird to be back..i want to just say hey you can take me back to my house..but i cant lol! anyway tho..i cried.  but then they all cheered me up..we had so much fun..Britt and I especially..haha! good times guys! welp im gald i came back this summer..im pretty sure this is one of the best summers i have had.  <big>I DONT WANNA GO BACK!!!!!!!!!!

<small>later! ♥ 


p.s.--MOLLY STUDIER IS SOOO HOTT!!!!!!! haha



And I don't want to fall to pieces 
I just want to sit and stare at you 
I don't want to talk about it 
And I don't want a conversation 
I just want to cry in front of you 
I don't want to talk about it 
'Cause I'm in love with you 

Wanna know who you are 
Wanna know where to start 
I wanna know what this means 
Wanna know how you feel 
Wanna know what is real 
I wanna know everything 
Everything 


[[good times..haha!]]

Omg this summer has prolly been one of the best summers i have ever had. lol!  I went to mollys on wednesday..we hung out for a while then we went to pick my stuff up from marys when to walgreensthe video store thing lol and then picked up Jake W and went to Gleason Kyle and Chris' baseball game. Fun stuff.  lol  yesterday Molly and I went to the beach but it was sooo cold! lol so we went back with ryane and then later Gillian allison marni and molly duffy came over we all hung out and talked. Then Gleason Jake Hill and Scott came over!  Coolest guys I know..lol!  We sorta had a water fight..we were soacked except SCOTT! =[  Later Britt KP and Ash came over..I almost wanted to cry last night because we were all sitting around studz's fire pit and everyone was like talking and laughing I had to get my camera..haha I dont want to go back AT ALL!  I seriously hate florida I always have so much fun! Last night I beat KP's record at chubby bunny..lol you have to fit as many marchmellows in ur mouth as u can KP can fit 9 and I got 10 lol!  after that was over i pretty much chocked on like half of one..i spit the rest of them out in the fire pit..lol SICK! That had to be the most fun I had like all summer...later that night Gillian Molly Molly and I had some fun..haha ;] Today I went to weights with Duffy molly gillian and allison...im like dead!!! 
Welp I really dont wanna go back to Florida if anyone has some ideas on how i could stay let me know! lol 
LATER! 
♥!

Well I can't even begin to explain whats been going on in my life..lol this whole month ive found out soo much and I can't wait for a new month to begin I just hope its not like June..lol

well here it is..lol laterr

Well in the beging of this month alot has happend..I broke up with a b/f.  Kicked myslef for about 3 days thinking I made the wrong decision..then I had a friend who helped me get over it and move on..luv ya missi! I met new people and I found out something really upsetting.  I always knew my grandpa drank alcohol, but I never had my dad and mom tell me he was an alcoholic or that he takes pain pills when he really doesnt need them, it just hurts.  I spent most of my life trying to be better then guys at almost anything possible and Ive tried to be the best at everything.  Thats why Im always like "I can do that to" or pretty much just have the attitude anything a guy can do(like sports, lifting or just anything that has to do with being active) I can do too.  My grandpa has always made me feel like my brother will always be better then me b/c hes a boy.  Thats why I surf, its the one thing I can do better then my bro and its the one thing I actually heard him say yea thats my granddaughter or say hes proud of me.  I love to surf..  Now its like all that, all that trying to do my best wasnt worth it.  I went from loving my grandpa when I was little to loving him less and less.  Then my mom says something like well addictions can be genetic or something like that.  I dont want to be like him.  I used to think my grandpa was soo cool now hes just not.  I went to Cocoa Beach in the begining of this month.  My grandpa got me a new surf board and it was really pretty.  I loved it! So my dad my bro my mom and my grandparents all went out to the beach.  My grandparents when back and my mom did too then I saw my grandpa come out with his wave ski and some kind of drink and my mom was behind him.  I needed a break anyway cus the current was real stong and I was tired of paddling.  So my grandpas sitting in his chair watching my dad surf and my bro skim board and hes drinking this huge mug of beer or some kind of alcohol. then he decides to go wave skiing, yeah didnt work out he barely got out and he almost didnt make it back in.  It just makes me soo mad! Idk..So lately I've just been hearing my mom and dad talk about how they dont want my brother or I to go there again untill he can not do it infront of us..yeah right.  So thats why I get mad at drunk people..lol and thats why Im afraide to drink too much, I know they're not alcoholics but I just dont want them turning into one.  It doesnt just hurt them but people around them.  My grandpa drinks and he already has a heart problem..im not alcohol does to ur heart but Im sure its not healthy..  Idk lots of things have been messed up, sometimes i find it hard to trust what people are telling me is the truth.  and sometimes its hard for me to believe anyone.  Ive just been confused..and all I have to say is that Im sorry for opening my mouth about anything..or saying anything that I shouldnt have said.  Things are finally starting to get better but lately its just been once things start to get better and I think my life is finally okay things get worse..i just hope july is a better month..lol well I'm done..I just needed to vent!

well yesterday was alot of fun, shaun, jon, missi and i all got to hang out before missi left for chicago today =[  Shaun and jon came over and we just sat around sorta watched meet the fockers, then we all ended up in my room..lol jon took my candle and wasted about have of my perfume cus he was squriting it on the flame..then some how he knocked over the candle and wax went absoutly everywhere! it was on my dresser my walls my door not to mention all over the floor..lol  then we went outside and jon threw me in the pool.  it wouldnt have been so bad if i wouldn't have had all my cloths on.  well im glad that shaun got a good laugh. lol  later missi came over we sorta watched seed of chuckie while shaun jon and missi faught over who got the rocking chair..well mostaly jon and missi. shaun and jon left and my mom ordered pappa jons for us.  we went for a walk and just talked later missi my mom and i had a really good talk about everything thats been going on. and about stuff u just really wouldn't imagin talking to my mom about..lol it was a great convo tho.  i was supprised that my mom missi and i could have so much fun talking to her.  it was like she was just my friend for a split second..lol! well missi left today =[ tomarrow is fathers day and so its pretty much church, lunch with my dad and the fam and then whatever my dad wants to do.  i need to hang out with sierra so i think we'll prolly do something and then july 6th i go to MICHIGAN!! im counting down the day till i get out of this HEAT! well i will try and update later,

later ♥♥ --kayla

my summer has been pretty great!  pretty much every day i've been hanging out with some awesome people.  missi and i did infact go tubing and it was awesome.  i havent gone tubing in soo long, like 2 years ago! lol i hung out with jon shaun and missi alot last week and we've had some great times.  missi and i have been bored for the past 3 weeks since summer started so we made the best of it being bored together..lmao so a few days ago missi and i went to the mall with her cousin and took some really funny but cute pics in my car, i would post them on here but i have NO idea how so if anyone knows, pleas tell me!  yesterday we went to the cape coral beach.  i thought the water in mona lake (in MI) was nastay but let me tell u, i can't say that i have ever seen red water. haha! it was alot of fun! only bad thing now is i have a really burnt back! this morning was the worst.  ever since i've moved down here my mom and i have been soo close it not even funny and my dad and i have to compete for the last word.  its getting tiring always trying to explain myself and then say things i didnt intend on saying and then have to fix the whole thing.  i've been trying everything to just get out of my house but it never works out..lol so when im really upset worried or angrey i usually go for a run, which i did.  i felt better, and then i took a shower and just woke up from my nap! lol but everythings better now and i think i might be going to a movie with Jonya lol! and Shaun! i'll update later maybe with pics if anyone can help me put them on that would be great..lol 
LaTeR! 

♥ kayla

well everything has gotten better. i've finally been able to have fun and laugh! =] tuesday missi and i went to jons and i met shaun and tj, pretty kool.  it was alot of fun tho! missi spent the night and we just talked about alot. today we just sat around cus its SOOOO boring here! omg! im gunna go nuts! lol we watched just married and then i walked missi home but i was too scared to walk back cus it was storming so we played out in the rain! haha! Well tomorrow my dads going to take us tubing and i can't waite cus i haven't gone in sooo long!! since like 2 summers ago! and then later we're prolly going to jon's! well i hope everyones summer is going great! later! 

♥! kayla

i'm not sure what i'm doing any more.  everything seems to be outta my control.  i think i lost the one person i actually cared about.  im not sure he knows how i think or feel.  i have a hard time telling people how i feel or what i think, i get mad b/c i guess i just expect them to kno.  i don't like it when people tell me what to do.  i like just sitting alone in my room listening to my music. i like getting new things and buying new cds. i'm prolly on the computer way to much.  i like to watch the rain.  i like cold days.  i like the beach and the ocean.  i like to tan.  yet i love the days when its gloomy and rainy.  i feel most at home when im at the beach. i miss alot of people.  its hard for me to move on.  i have a hard time letting go of people.  i don't like it when things have to change but i don't want things to stay the same.  i prolly care about what others think too much.  i get mad when im really confused. i don't like it when people tell me what i think or believe, b/c they don't kno.  i hate being bored.  i like to laugh.  i laugh at pretty much anything.  i don't like it when people judge me or other people before they get to know them.  surfing s my fav. thing.  i love my friends.  my family means alot to me.  i go to church. i'm me.  

idk...just felt like sharing...this whole week has been so messed up...i don't know what to do anymore and i want someone to just tell me what i should do.  i hate how they just say i can't tell u what to do..i just don't know.  i wish i could just fast foward to see what the outcome of all this will be.  i just want to see if anythings worth it.  

                                                          -kayla-

well the first two days of summer couldn't get any better.  Thurday didn't even feel like it was the last day of school.  it was so weird to get into the whole last day of school mood.  thursday i spent the night at missi's awesome day!  We went bridge jumping again..friday just hung around missi's house and went bridge jumping again, ian made us lunch! lol :*  then later missi and i were going to see kicking and screaming but there was a TON of people there so we didn't really feel like it.  we ate at this Italian resturaunt and pretty much got stalked..lol!! then we went to jc pennys out looks..just walked around.  we went back to missi's and then everyone told me that ian got some bug stuff in his eyes and inhaled it..so part of the time ian had to flush his eyes out. i feelt so bad!  then we went for a walk and yeah it was quite interesting...=/ Well this morning i woke up with a fever, my stomach hurt, my back, legs, neck, and head hurt sooooooooo bad!! Well everything still hurts but my stomach...i think i might go back to bed. =]

luv ya!--kayla

Ian and I are so much better now.  I think having that fight just mad the both of us realize how much we both care about each other!  I couldn't be any more happier.  Today was an awesome day.  Hung out with Ian Missi and Justin.  We went bridge jumping! Most awesome expirence of my life.  I love that feeling of falling! haha! It was awesome.  Tomorrow just Missi Ian and i r goin..Justin has work! HAHA!  well good news is that theres only 2 more days of school left!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Bad news...4 more exams!! =/! AND..like a lonnggg time before i leave for Muskegon!  I just want to go right now! =]! well, ttyl luvs!

<3!-kayla

Well this weekend was the best weekend I've had in a long time. 

Friday- I hung out with Ian, Missi, Gracie, and Justin.  It was also 3 months for me and Ian and Friday the 13th..lol!  It was alot of fun, we swam, Missi and I took some really cute pictures, Justin was trying to teach missi and i how to throw a fish net thingy, and then we all went for a walk and hung out.  Doesn't sound like much but it was great. 

Saturday- Ashley's b/f took us to the mall and we got some cute new shirts..ashley almost spent all her 200 dollars...she had 10 left over..haha!  But we had a ton of fun! Then I went home and at like 7 i went to Ians house.  we watched chairmen of the board room or sumthing like that.  It was kinda stupid..lol Then i watched the begining of the day after tomorrow. 

TODAY- I'm going to church and then who knows what...finals are in 2 weeks i think...=/  and only

2 more weeks of school left!    <3!-Kayla

this will probably be my last entery for a while, i need to be more focused on school and everything else so i will update when i can..luv ya
-kayla

not a whole lot has been going on latly.  just the usual, school - which, as it is getting closer and closer to the end of the year, im getting more and more anxious for summer to begin. i've been in a weird mood lately, i just don't feel like doing a whole lot, like my homework, schoolwork, my chores, etc. pretty much if i don't feel the need to do anything i won't. its like i have to force myself everyday to get out of bed and go to school or do my homework. idk what it is, maybe just lack of much needed sleep.

friday i hung out with ian.  then saturday i got some sun, maybe too much lol then ian and i went to see guess who.  saturday was also my parents 17th wedding anniversery, but they usually go by how long they've known eachother which is 27 years.  i look at them and it gives me hope that relationships can really last a long time.  my mom and dad have been going out since 8th grade.  its just amazing.  now normally i would sit here and type all the things that have been bothering me or things that im upset about.  but none of that really matters, so many other people in this world have way bigger problems to deal with everyday of their life.  and mine, well they don't seem that big of a problem anymore.  well i have to go eat dinner! Love ya! 

<3!*kayla

these past couple of weeks have made me relize that its safe to say i love ian.   i havent felt this way about someone in a long time.  it almost seems too good to be true, that one day i will wake up and it could all be gone.  i havent been this happy in God knows how long.  this summer i will most likley be able to go to michigan, i'm really looking forward to that.  

last thursday i went to miami and then south beach.  south beach has to be the most beautiful beach in florida.  the water looks fake, like it came out of a book or something.  its just pretty.  friday my mom and i went to the mall.  we haven't "hung out" in a while and going shopping was great for us to just catch up with each other.  saturday i want to islands of adventure for my first time with ian and his family plus michael(riley's friend, ian's little brother) for Riley's bithday.  it was alot of fun. even the drive there and back was fun, i slept most of the time b/c i was soo tired and then i had to make another 3 hour trip to miami on sunday, but it was fun.   so that was my weekend..i'll update later..

<3*Kayla

Well, being 15 isnt that great. =p Its good that I'm getting older, but its just reminding me of how long i've been living here.  Not that its a bad thing its just that I get a little home sick still.  My family and friends are up there enjoying snow and Im not! haha  The anninversery of my grandmas and my great grandmas death is coming up soon and I just wish I could go to the cementary and put flowers by their graves.  Sorry if that sounds a little weird.  Plus the only time I actually feel close to them is at that cementary or when Im on the dunes in MI.  Im not sure whats going on, I'm feeling emo, I guess u could say.  I need some more "me time" I haven't really had any lately.  I finally saved the 200 dollars I need to go to Michigan.  I have to admit I really can't wait to go back! I miss it there soo much.  I miss the people as much as I miss just going down all the roads.lol!  Well this weekend Ians going to this race thing and I'm going camping w/keely till sunday and I'm going to miss him!! =] For some reason when I was talking to him today after school I was kinda mad that he was going, and sad I wasn't going to see him till sunday. haha!  Im such a dork. lol! Well I'll update when I get back! I hope everyone has a great 4 day weekend, 8 more days till SPRING BREAK 2005!!
